Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: The Sair da Casca exclusive tool that measures companies' contributions to society includes various environmental impact metrics. These may include but are not limited to greenhouse gas emissions, water consumption, waste generation and management, biodiversity conservation, and land use and habitat preservation or restoration. By measuring these key indicators, Sair da Casca provides a comprehensive evaluation of a company's environmental performance, helping stakeholders understand its impact on the environment and guide efforts towards more sustainable practices.

source.content: Event management has marked Flávia professional career in parallel with her basic training in Educational Psychology Over the years she has developed educational projects of social character acquiring experience in the coordination and management in the level of the human and financial resources She is part of the Sair da Casca team after 16 years of experience in several areas being events and psychology the ones who have gained more prominence At Sair da Casca Flávia works primarily on educational projects aimed at raising awareness among school/ community members about healthy living habits inclusion and preservation of environmental resources Licentiate Degree in Educational Psychology at Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias

Divided between the corporate world and the social sector Fatima’s path was built in parallel with eight years of business communication ten years of customer management and most recently the passion for people drove her to her field of training Volunteering has been a constant over time and has been a transformative element in many experiences as trainer in volunteer management at Pista Mágica volunteer at CrescerSer foster home Serve the City solidary dinners and representative of IMPACT a worldwide initiative that focuses on the alignment of corporate volunteering projects towards the achievement of sustainable development goals SDGs Today as consultant at Sair da Casca bridges those two worlds that Fátima knows so well developing strategic philanthropy projects and sustainability strategies Degree in Communication Sciences from the Autonomous University of Lisbon

O Maze e a Sair da Casca co-organizam o Ariane de Rothschild Fellowship – Winter Bootcamp que decorre em Lisboa de 5 a 8 de março e contará com a presença de 21 empreendedores sociais A missão deste Fellowship é criar ponte nas fronteiras entre comunidades minoritárias na Europa e América do Norte em particular mas não exclusivamente judias e muçulmanas Ao longo do tempo este objetivo tem sido  possível  através da construção de uma rede de empreendedores que estão comprometidos com a inclusão e em simultâneo com o fortalecimento da sua organização

source.content: During her academic career at the Nova School of Business and Economics she joined the Nova Social Consulting club where she had the opportunity to work for the first time with third sector organizations Developed strategy projects as a junior consultant and team leader and collaborated with B Lab in its launch phase in Portugal Carolina began her professional career at EY former Ernst  Young as a financial advisor integrating the Valuation Modelling and Economics team Performed evaluations of companies and individual assets developed feasibility studies business plans and reviews of business models closely following various sectors from a financial perspective After her experience at EY she wanted to develop skills in organizations oriented towards a social impact and for 6 months volunteered at THE NGO MOVE in Azores where she supported entrepreneurs to develop their local businesses and gave training related to entrepreneurship To redirect her professional career in order to

volunteered at THE NGO MOVE in Azores where she supported entrepreneurs to develop their local businesses and gave training related to entrepreneurship To redirect her professional career in order to contribute to a better world she returned to EY where she played the role of consultant in the Climate Change and Sustainability Services CCaSS team having participated mainly in sustainability strategy and reporting projects with international and multidisciplinary teams At Sair da Casca Carolina integrates strategy projects ESG performance and sustainability reporting Graduated in Management and master’s in finance from Nova School of Business and Economics

Communication with children and youth is her passion Raquel is our specialist in educational programs as coordinator of the same and responsible for the training and development of the competences of the team in this scope Raquel is also in charge of partners management of Sair da Casca namely for logistics and implementation She has an extensive experience in projects aimed at children and youth in sectors such as energy agri-food road safety health and forest sustainability Furthermore participates in the organization and operation of several meetings/ events of educational projects and other communication projects of Sair da Casca She’s also dedicated to the investigation of trends related to the educational community and manages the relationship of Sair da Casca with the most relevant stakeholders in this area At Sair da Casca has been tracing her path focusing on the strategic pillar of Education for Sustainability in the company having become coordinator of this area Licentiate

O Banco Santander Totta solicitou o nosso apoio para criar e gerir um programa que incentive à prática de uma cidadania ativa através do voluntariado e que recompense o esforço dos jovens envolvidos Foi criado o Prémio de Voluntariado Universitário que pretende apoiar o desenvolvimento e distinguir as melhores práticas de voluntariado promovidas por estudantes do Ensino Superior Dez projetos finalistas recebem um apoio na comunicação e divulgação mediática e os três projetos vencedores recebem um apoio pecuniário até € e mentoria estratégica por um diretor sénior do Banco O Prémio Voluntariado Universitário foi lançado em  contou na 1ª edição com mais de 50 candidaturas com um impacto importante na sociedade mobilizando cerca de  voluntários em causas diversas e impactando mais de  beneficiários

source.content: No seu percurso profissional passou pelas áreas de contabilidade finanças auditoria e gestão de projetos na Complai no Leroy Merlin e na KPMG Esta experiência acabou por reforçar o seu interesse pela economia social e pela importância da criação de valor nas empresas para os seus stakeholders Ao ser confrontado com diversas realidades empresariais percebeu que é preciso melhorar os processos no que diz respeito ao seu propósito e comunicação a nível interno o que Simon Sinek indicaria como círculo dourado na definição do “O quê” do “Como” e do “Porquê” de um negócio Com este drive de mudar mentalidades de administradores nacionais criou uma empresa de consultoria especializada em fundos comunitários a Kenaz que permite às empresas não só usufruir de ajudas fiscais como ajudar a criar mais emprego no país Sedento de conhecimento ingressou a Sair da Casca pois revia-se nos valores da empresa e na responsabilidade que esta geração tem de deixar um impacto positivo para o futuro Com

Durante o seu percurso académico o Martinho ganhou competências e focou-se na análise quantitativa de dados Neste âmbito teve a oportunidade de colaborar no departamento de controlling financeiro na Europcar Mobility Group e depois esta experiência percebeu a necessidade de tirar um mestrado em Economia que lhe permitisse estar em contacto com uma diversidade de áreas como macroeconomia finanças e políticas públicas Na Sair da Casca o Martinho integra projetos de estratégia desempenho ESG e reporting de sustentabilidade Licenciado e mestre em Economia pela Nova School of Business and Economics

Research & Innovation.question: What research grants or innovation awards have been recently distributed?
Research & Innovation.result: Based on the provided information, there are two notable instances of research grants or innovation awards that were distributed. One of them was mentioned earlier - the Prémio de Voluntariado Universitário (Volunteerism University Prize), which aimed to support active citizenship through university student volunteering and reward those who demonstrated exceptional commitment. This program recognized ten finalist projects and awarded three winning projects with financial support up to €100 and strategic guidance by senior directors from Banco Santander Totta.

source.content: O Banco Santander Totta solicitou o nosso apoio para criar e gerir um programa que incentive à prática de uma cidadania ativa através do voluntariado e que recompense o esforço dos jovens envolvidos Foi criado o Prémio de Voluntariado Universitário que pretende apoiar o desenvolvimento e distinguir as melhores práticas de voluntariado promovidas por estudantes do Ensino Superior Dez projetos finalistas recebem um apoio na comunicação e divulgação mediática e os três projetos vencedores recebem um apoio pecuniário até € e mentoria estratégica por um diretor sénior do Banco O Prémio Voluntariado Universitário foi lançado em  contou na 1ª edição com mais de 50 candidaturas com um impacto importante na sociedade mobilizando cerca de  voluntários em causas diversas e impactando mais de  beneficiários

volunteered at THE NGO MOVE in Azores where she supported entrepreneurs to develop their local businesses and gave training related to entrepreneurship To redirect her professional career in order to contribute to a better world she returned to EY where she played the role of consultant in the Climate Change and Sustainability Services CCaSS team having participated mainly in sustainability strategy and reporting projects with international and multidisciplinary teams At Sair da Casca Carolina integrates strategy projects ESG performance and sustainability reporting Graduated in Management and master’s in finance from Nova School of Business and Economics

During her academic career at the Nova School of Business and Economics she joined the Nova Social Consulting club where she had the opportunity to work for the first time with third sector organizations Developed strategy projects as a junior consultant and team leader and collaborated with B Lab in its launch phase in Portugal Carolina began her professional career at EY former Ernst  Young as a financial advisor integrating the Valuation Modelling and Economics team Performed evaluations of companies and individual assets developed feasibility studies business plans and reviews of business models closely following various sectors from a financial perspective After her experience at EY she wanted to develop skills in organizations oriented towards a social impact and for 6 months volunteered at THE NGO MOVE in Azores where she supported entrepreneurs to develop their local businesses and gave training related to entrepreneurship To redirect her professional career in order to

benchmark and market analysis in the field of Education as well as of the relationship with institutional partners in different areas including official bodies related to education The projects she led received several national and international awards such as the Energy Globe Award Energy Globe Foundation Best Social Responsibility Campaign Meios  Publicidade and Best Social Responsibility Communication Campaign APCE Recently she began to become involved in the B Corp movement being crucial for Sair da Casca certification process In addition to education she is passionate about other issues related to children as well as to the cause of animals’ rights and gender equality
